title: Understanding Relationships
text: In a one-to-many relationship, one entity in a table can be associated with multiple entities in another table. This is common in databases where one record in a table can relate to many records in another table.

title: Identifying the Correct Option
text: Consider the structure of tables in a database. A one-to-many relationship often involves a primary key in one table that corresponds to multiple foreign keys in another table.

hintAnswer: when the number of rows are different
title: Analyzing the Options
text: Which option best describes a one-to-many relationship?
choices: when the number of rows are different
when the number of columns are different
when the number of data visualization methods are different
